Posts.Content:
Dear Jacey,
Thank you so much for your encouraging reply. I guess I can't do anything but wait until Thursday. Meanwhile I'll keep busy. I'll post when I know. Thanks again.
Posts.Title: Lab called to come for follow-up
Lab called to come for follow-up

Posts.Content:
Thanks BEV. I'm feeling much better about
 this.
Posts.Title: Lab called to come for follow-up

Posts.Content:
I just went for the second mammogram and an ultrasound. The radiologist said it looks like a hematoma from a bruise. I have to go back in 3 months. If it is a hematoma it will be gone, If not, it won't have had time to grow.So I guess this is good news. I'm actually a little nauseated from nerves. 
 I want to thank all of you who took the time to write. I'm sure you understand how much I appreciate it.
God bless you and take care.
Marsha
Posts.Title: Lab called to come for follow-up
